ns:common.topic.description:
IEC 61131-3 is the third part of the open international standard IEC 61131 for programmable logic controllers, and was first published in December 1993 by the IEC. The current edition was published in February 2013.
Part 3 of IEC 61131 deals with programming languages and defines two graphical and two textual PLC programming language standards:
Ladder diagram, graphical
Function block diagram, graphical
Structured text, textual
Instruction list, textual
Sequential function chart, has elements to organize programs for sequential and parallel control processing.
Continuous Function Chart. This language is an extension to the IEC 61131-3 standard, which gives free positioning of graphic elements.
rdfs:label: IEC 61131-3

ns:common.document.text: IEC 61131-3 is a standard in PLC computer programming languages. The five languages\nto which this standard applies share common elements so different languages can be used in the same program.\nVariable attributes: RETAIN, CONSTANT, AT

ns:type.object.name: IEC 61131-3
